Published by DSB The payment was completed, but there was an error in retrieving the course.\n Please contact Trainor by e-mail or phone and we will help you. Unable to deliver course Hi,\n\nI bought a course through the app, but there was a technical error and the course was unable to be delivered.\n\nTechnical info:\n\n User ID: Order ID: Course ID: Time of purchase:
When buying course via app. your receipt will be from Google Play store. You will not receive a receipt from trainor.no. Please be aware that discounts are not available on in-app purchases and prices may differ from www.trainor.no. I understand All prices includes VAT. Discounts are not available on in-app purchases. Have new hazards / risks been identified during the conversation? Topic discussed Planned follow-up Observation and handling of energies \n\nRisk Based Observation technique - RIBO \n\nOVERSIGHT: Before starting a job, stop and get an overview of the area in which you are about to work. \nLIMIT THE AREA: Split the working area into smaller segments to give you the required overview. \nSPOT ENERGY: Identify those types of energies in and around your work area that can represent a risk. Implement and note eventual measures to be taken to secure safe job execution. Heat / cold Pressure Chemical Electrical Gravity Radiation Noise Biological Energy in movement Check of self produced energies and activities: Are you "PRESENT IN THE MOMENT"? Place/Platform Department ConocoPhillips Please select a Department for the selected place/platform Please select valid place/platform. Card is saved locally. If the company you work for use sikkerhetskort.no you can add your card here by confirming your contact details and it will stay up to date Verify phone or e-mail Have a safety card from sikkerhetskort.no? Add it to app by validating your e-mail or phone number Click the e-mail or phone number you would like to verify.
